title: Application to pending actions
context: [ยง624D-7] Application to pending actions. This chapter applies to requests for discovery in cases pending on April 12, 2012. [L 2012, c 17, pt of ยง1] Revision Note &ldquo;April 12, 2012&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this chapter&rdquo;.
